entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.2°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
